location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J D Campbell, Bushire to Sir Harford Jones [Brydges], Sheerauz [Shiraz]

physicalDescription.extent: The letter appears to be transcribed here in error.
Condition: The item has suffered from minor pest damage, which has partially obscured the date of the letter. However, the date can still be clearly read.

mods.abstract: The letter mentions that the HCC Teignmouthhas arrived at Bushire and discusses a range of packets that have arrived addressed to the recipient of this letter. The letter has been crossed out.One enclosure; a letter from William Bruce, Assistant to the Resident at Bushire to Jafer Ali Khan [Ja‘afar ‘Alī Khān]. It concerns a copy of the Koran purchased in India, which is to be delivered to [Nassur Ollah Khan] as a gift.
